AT.name: Pokémon Traumradar
AT.description: Im Spiel schlüpfst du in die Rolle des Assistenten von Professor Burnett – einem Wissenschaftler, der die Intertraumzone erforscht. Drehe und kippe in diesem bewegungsgesteuerten Spiel dein Nintendo 3DS-System, um zu zielen, Lichtstrahlen auf die Traumwolken abzufeuern und Belohnungen einzuheimsen! Dieses Spiel bietet Spaß für jedermann und stellt zudem eine faktenreiche Ergänzung zu Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 und Pokémon Weiße Edition 2 dar. Alle Pokémon oder Items, die du in Pokémon Traumradar ergatterst, können in Pokémon Schwarze Edition 2 und Pokémon Weiße Edition 2 übertragen werden. Dies ist besonders nützlich, denn die von dir gefangenen Pokémon verfügen eventuell über verborgene Fähigkeiten, die in diesen Spielen sonst nicht verfügbar sind, und auch manche der Items sind dort normalerweise nicht auffindbar. Also versuche, deinen Pokédex mit so vielen Pokémon wie möglich zu füllen!

AU.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
AU.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Any caught Pokémon or items you pick up in Pokémon Dream Radar can be transferred to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2, which is very useful, since the Pokémon you catch might have hidden abilities not available for those games, and some items that can’t normally be found either. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

BR.name: Pokémon™ Dream Radar
BR.description: Pokémon Dream Radar é um jogo de tiros controlado por movimentos que permitem o jogador usar a tecnologia de realidade aumentada para perseguir os Pokémon que aparecem no Interdream Zone! O jogo usa as funções mais incríveis do Nintendo 3DS, incluindo a câmera externa que captura imagens em 3D e o sensor de giroscópio. Você poderá capturar Pokémon difíceis de se obter no Pokémon Dream Radar, inclusive o trio composto pelos Legendary Tornadus, Thundurus e Landorus, que aparecem em Formes completamente novos no jogo. A aparência desses três Pokémon em Therian Forme é bem diferente da tradicional Incarnate Forme. Ao usar o seu Nintendo 3DS, você também poderá enviar os Pokémon que capturar para a sua cópia do jogo Pokémon Black Version 2 ou Pokémon White Version 2 para o Nintendo DS, e completar ainda mais o seu Pokédex!

BG.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
BG.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Any caught Pokémon or items you pick up in Pokémon Dream Radar can be transferred to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2, which is very useful, since the Pokémon you catch might have hidden abilities not available for those games, and some items that can’t normally be found either. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

BE.name: RAdar Pokémon
BE.description: Dans ce jeu, vous incarnez l'assistant du Professeur Pimprenelle, un scientifique spécialisé dans l’étude de l'interstice du rêve. Déplacez votre console Nintendo 3DS™ autour de vous dans ce jeu d'action à reconnaissance de mouvements pour viser et tirer sur les Nuages de Rêve et ainsi recevoir des récompenses ! Tout le monde pourra s'amuser avec ce jeu qui représente un complément idéal pour Pokémon Version Noire 2 et Pokémon Version Blanche 2. Chaque Pokémon ou objet trouvé dans RAdar Pokémon peut être transféré dans Pokémon Version Noire 2 et Pokémon Version Blanche 2, ce qui peut s'avérer très utile dans la mesure où les Pokémon que vous attrapez peuvent avoir des capacités cachées ou des objets rares introuvables dans ces deux jeux. Tentez de remplir votre Pokédex autant que possible !

CA.name: Pokémon™ Dream Radar
CA.description: Pokémon Dream Radar is a motion-controlled shooting game that allows you to use Augmented Reality technology to chase down Pokémon that appear in the Interdream Zone! The game uses some of the coolest features of the Nintendo 3DS system, including the 3D camera and gyro sensor. You can catch hard-to-get Pokémon in Pokémon Dream Radar. Including the Legendary trio Tornadus, Thundurus, and Landorus, which show up in all-new Formes in the game. The appearance of these three Pokémon in Therian Forme is very different from their traditional Incarnate Forme. When using your Nintendo 3DS system, you can also send the Pokémon you catch to your copy of the Pokémon Black Version 2 or Pokémon White Version 2 game for the Nintendo DS™ system, giving you even more ways to fill up your Pokédex!

ES.name: RAdar Pokémon
ES.description: En este juego, interpretarás a un ayudante del profesor Pimpinela, un científico que está estudiando la Dimensión Onírica. Mueve tu consola Nintendo 3DS a tu alrededor en este juego de acción controlado por movimientos e intenta apuntar y disparar tu rayo de luz a las Nubes Oníricas para recibir tu premio. El juego ofrece diversión para todos y resulta un complemento perfecto para Pokémon Edición Negra 2 y Pokémon Edición Blanca 2. Los Pokémon y objetos capturados en RAdar Pokémon pueden ser transferidos a estos dos títulos. Esto te resultará muy útil, porque quizás atrapes Pokémon que cuentan con habilidades ocultas no disponibles en Pokémon Edición Negra 2 y Pokémon Edición Blanca 2 y porque muchos de los objetos de RAdar Pokémon no están disponibles en dichos juegos. Intenta completar así tu Pokédex.

Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

IT.name: RAdar Pokémon
IT.description: In questo gioco vestirai i panni dell'assistente del Professor Magnolia, uno scienziato che studia la Dimensione Onirica. Muovi la tua console Nintendo 3DS per prendere la mira, indirizzare il fascio di luce sulle Nuvole Oniriche e raccogliere le tue ricompense! Questo gioco farà divertire tutti e si integra benissimo a Pokémon Versione Nera 2 e Pokémon Versione Bianca 2. Ogni Pokémon catturato e ogni oggetto raccolto in RAdar Pokémon, infatti, potrà essere trasferito in Pokémon Versione Nera 2 e Pokémon Versione Bianca 2. Questo ti sarà molto utile dato che i Pokémon che catturi potrebbero avere abilità nascoste non presenti nei suddetti giochi, così come potresti trovare oggetti che normalmente non compaiono in questi titoli. Quindi cerca di completare il tuo Pokédex fino in fondo!

KR.name: 포켓몬 AR 서처
KR.description: 「포켓몬 AR 서처」는 닌텐도 3DS 카메라를 사용해 현실 세계를 무대로 게임을 즐길 수 있습니다. 내 방이나 야외 등 어느 장소에서라도 카메라를 움직이면 포켓몬이 등장합니다. 모험의 무대 「꿈의 틈새」에서는 빔을 쏘아 포켓몬을 잡을 수 있습니다. 닌텐도 3DS의 방향을 바꾸면서 날아 다니는 포켓몬을 겨냥해 봅시다. 닌텐도 3DS 본체에 탑재된 카메라와 자이로 센서 기능을 사용해 실제로 포켓몬이 바로 앞에 있는 듯한 느낌의 슈팅 게임을 즐길 수 있습니다. 「포켓몬 AR 서처」로 잡은 포켓몬은 「포켓몬스터 블랙 2・화이트 2」로 데려갈 수 있으며, 「포켓몬 AR 서처」로만 손에 넣을 수 있는 특별한 포켓몬도 있습니다. ※ 본 소프트웨어의 대응 언어를 확인하신 후 구입하시기 바랍니다.

LT.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
LT.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Any caught Pokémon or items you pick up in Pokémon Dream Radar can be transferred to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2, which is very useful, since the Pokémon you catch might have hidden abilities not available for those games, and some items that can’t normally be found either. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

MX.name: RAdar Pokémon™
MX.description: ¡RAdar Pokémon es un juego de disparos con control de movimiento, y te permite utilizar tecnología de realidad aumentada para perseguir Pokémon que aparecen en la zona Interdream Zone! El juego utiliza algunas de las características más divertidas de la consola Nintendo 3DS, incluyendo la aplicación Cámara de Nintendo 3DS y el sensor de giro. En RAdar Pokémon podrás conseguir Pokémon difíciles de atrapar, incluyendo el Trío Legendario, Tornadus, Thundurus, y Landorus, los cuales aparecen en Formes totalmente nuevas en el juego. La apariencia de estos tres Pokémon en Therian Forme es muy diferente a su tradicional Incarnate Forme. Cuando uses tu consola Nintendo 3DS, también podrás enviar los Pokémon que atrapes a tu juego Pokémon Black Version 2 o Pokémon White Version 2 para la consola Nintendo DS™, ¡así tendrás más opciones para completar tu Pokédex!

NO.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
NO.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Any caught Pokémon or items you pick up in Pokémon Dream Radar can be transferred to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2, which is very useful, since the Pokémon you catch might have hidden abilities not available for those games, and some items that can’t normally be found either. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

NL.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
NL.description: In het spel ben je de assistent van Professor Burnet, een wetenschapper die onderzoek doet naar de Interdream Zone. In dit bewegingsgestuurde spel moet je je Nintendo 3DS-systeem rondom je bewegen om met een lichtstraal op de Dream Clouds te schieten en bonussen te verzamelen! Dit spel is geschikt voor elke speler en sluit perfect aan op Pokémon Black Version 2 en Pokémon White Version 2. Alle Pokémon en voorwerpen die je hebt ontvangen in Pokémon Dream Radar kun je namelijk overzetten naar Pokémon Black Version 2 en Pokémon White Version 2. Dit kan erg handig zijn, omdat de gevangen Pokémon soms eigenschappen hebben die ze in die spellen ontberen, terwijl je zo ook voorwerpen kunt krijgen die niet in de spellen zitten. Een mooie manier om je Pokédex steeds verder te vullen!

NZ.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
NZ.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

PT.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
PT.description: O jogo convida-te a assumir o papel de um assistente que trabalha para o Professor Burnet, um cientista que estuda a Interdream Zone. Move a tua Nintendo 3DS™ em todas as direções neste jogo de ação controlado através dos movimentos do jogador e tenta acertar nas Dream Clouds com o teu feixe de luz para receberes recompensas! Para além de divertido e acessível a todos, este jogo constitui o acompanhamento recheado de factos perfeito para Pokémon Black Version 2 e Pokémon White Version 2. Qualquer Pokémon ou item apanhado em Pokémon Dream Radar pode ser transferido para Pokémon Black Version 2 e Pokémon White Version 2, o que se revela bastante útil uma vez que os Pokémon que apanhares poderão ter habilidades escondidas não disponíveis nesses jogos e até itens que não poderás encontrar normalmente. Tenta completar o teu Pokédex!

RU.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
RU.description: В игре Pokémon Radar вы возьмете на себя роль ассистента профессора Burnet — ученого, исследующего Pokémon в Interdream Zone. Перемещайте Nintendo 3DS в пространстве и стреляйте лучами света по Dream Clouds, чтобы получать награды и предметы! Pokémon Radar отлично дополняет игры Pokémon Black Version 2 и Pokémon White Version 2, ведь все пойманные Pokémon и предметы могут быть перенесены прямо в эти игры. Это очень полезно, потому что можно обзавестись редкими монстрами и ценными вещами! Постарайтесь заполнить свой Pokédex полностью!

SE.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
SE.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! SI.name: Pokémon Dream Radar
SI.description: In the game you’ll be taking on the role of an assistant who works for Professor Burnet - a scientist studying the Interdream Zone. Move your Nintendo 3DS system around in this motion-controlled action game and take aim to shoot your light beam at the Dream Clouds and collect your rewards! This game is fun for anybody, and a fact-filled accompaniment to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2. Any caught Pokémon or items you pick up in Pokémon Dream Radar can be transferred to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2, which is very useful, since the Pokémon you catch might have hidden abilities not available for those games, and some items that can’t normally be found either. Try to fill up your Pokédex as much as you can!

US.name: Pokémon™ Dream Radar
US.description: Pokémon Dream Radar is a motion-controlled shooting game that allows you to use Augmented Reality technology to chase down Pokémon that appear in the Interdream Zone! The game uses some of the coolest features of the Nintendo 3DS system, including the 3D camera and gyro sensor. You can catch hard-to-get Pokémon in Pokémon Dream Radar. Including the Legendary trio Tornadus, Thundurus, and Landorus, which show up in all-new Formes in the game. The appearance of these three Pokémon in Therian Forme is very different from their traditional Incarnate Forme. When using your Nintendo 3DS system, you can also send the Pokémon you catch to your copy of the Pokémon Black Version 2 or Pokémon White Version 2 game for the Nintendo DS™ system, giving you even more ways to fill up your Pokédex!
